subtasks.title: Research topic ideas
subtasks.description: Gather information on AI's impact on healthcare.

subtasks.title: Choose a topic for the blog post
subtasks.description: Choose a specific aspect to focus on.

subtasks.title: Outline the structure of the blog post
Design Phase
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for the website layout and design.

subtasks.title: Development Phase
subtasks.description: Code the front-end and back-end of the website according to the approved design.

subtasks.title: Testing Phase
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix any bugs or issues.

subtasks.title: Deployment Phase
subtasks.description: Deploy the website to the production server and ensure it's accessible to users.

subtasks.title: Maintenance Phase
subtasks.description: Regularly update and maintain the website to keep it secure and up-to-date with the latest content and features.
